extensionName.description: Name of the extension and the native receiver selector window title.

extensionDescription.message: Добавляет поддержку трансляций Chromecast для веб приложений (таких как Netflix или BBC iPlayer), HTML5 видео и демонстрацию экрана.
extensionDescription.description: Description of the extension shown in the add-ons manager.

actionTitleDefault.description: Title for toolbar button in default state.

actionTitleConnecting.description: Title for toolbar button whilst connecting.

actionTitleConnected.description: Title for toolbar button whilst connected.

popupWhitelistNotWhitelisted.description: Receiver selector whitelist suggestion banner label.

popupWhitelistAddToWhitelist.description: Receiver selector whitelist suggestion banner button label.

popupMediaTypeApp.description: Receiver selector media type <option> text for current site's sender application.

popupMediaTypeAppNotFound.description: Receiver selector media type <option> text for current site's sender application if none found.

popupMediaTypeAppMedia.description: Receiver selector media type <option> text for media casting.

popupMediaTypeScreen.description: Receiver selector media type <option> text for screen.

popupMediaTypeFile.description: Receiver selector media type <option> text for opening a file selector dialog.

popupNoReceiversFound.description: Message displayed in the receiver selector if there are no available receivers.

popupCastButtonTitle.description: Button text for each receiver entry in the receiver selector.

popupCastingButtonTitle.description: Button text while establishing a session in the receiver selector. Ellipsis cycles (. → .. → ...) as loading indicator.

popupStopButtonTitle.description: Alternate action button text displayed instead of popupCastButtonTitle.

popupCastMenuTitle.description: Menu text for cast item in context menu for receivers in receiver selector.

popupStopMenuTitle.description: Menu text for stop item in context menu for receivers in receiver selector.

popupMediaSkipPrevious.description: Media controls skip previous button title.

popupMediaSkipNext.description: Media controls skip next button title.

popupMediaSeek.description: Media controls seek bar accessibility label.

popupMediaSeekBackward.description: Media controls seek backward button title.

popupMediaSeekForward.description: Media controls seek forward button title.

popupMediaVolume.description: Media controls volume slider accessibility label.

popupMediaLive.description: Media controls label displayed for live streams.

popupSearchClear.description: Media devices search clear button title.

contextCast.description: Main context menu item title. Ellipsis indicates additional information required as it triggers opening of receiver selector.

contextAddToWhitelist.description: Top-level whitelist context menu item title.

contextAddToWhitelistAdvancedAdd.description: Context menu item title for all other match patterns.

optionsBridgeLoading.description: Loading placeholder text for bridge section on options page.

optionsBridgeIssueStatusTextTimedOut.description: Bridge timed out issue additional description text.

optionsBridgeIssueStatusTextAuthenticati.description: Bridge authentication issue additional description text.

optionsBridgeNotFoundStatusText.message: Попробуйте скачать и установить последнию версию.
optionsBridgeNotFoundStatusText.description: Bridge not found additional description text

optionsBridgeStatsExpectedVersion.description: Bridge stats expected version row title.

optionsBridgeStatsRecommendedAction.description: Bridge stats recommended action row title.

optionsBridgeOlderAction.message: Версия моста старше чем ожидалось, попробуйте обновить мост до последней версии.
optionsBridgeOlderAction.description: Recommended action for when the installed bridge version is older than the installed extension version.

optionsBridgeNewerAction.message: Версия моста новее чем ожидалось, попробуйте обновить расширение до последней версии.
optionsBridgeNewerAction.description: Recommended action for when the installed bridge version is newer than the installed extension version.

optionsBridgeNoAction.description: Recommended action for when both bridge and extension versions are compatible or likely compatible.

optionsBridgeUpdateChecking.description: Update check button title while in progress. Ellipsis cycles (. → .. → ...) as loading indicator.

optionsBridgeUpdateStatusNoUpdates.description: Update status if no updates are found.

optionsBridgeUpdateStatusError.description: Update status if an error was encountered checking for updates.

optionsBridgeUpdateAvailable.description: Update status if an update was found.

optionsBridgeUpdate.description: Update now button title. Ellipsis indicates additional information as it triggers an update window popup.

optionsBridgeUpdateViewChangelog.description: Link text for changelog link next to bridge update button.

optionsBridgeBackupEnabled.description: Backup daemon checkbox label. Host/port inputs are inserted inline at the hostPort substitution.

optionsBridgeBackupEnabledDescription.message: Если неудаётся соединенится с мостом, попробуйте запустить мост в режиме сервиса.

optionsBridgeBackupSecureDescription.message: Соединение с сервисом через HTTPS. Требует дополнительной настройки.

optionsBridgeBackupPasswordDescription.message: Опциональный пароль настроен для соединения с сервисом.

optionsMediaCategoryName.description: Options page media casting category title.

optionsMediaCategoryDescription.description: Options page media casting category description.

optionsMediaSyncElementDescription.message: Синхронизировать состояние (воспроизвдение, громкость, титры и прочее...) между транслируемым медиа и устройством.

optionsMediaStopOnUnload.message: Остановить воспроизведение на устройстве при выгрузке страницы
optionsMediaStopOnUnload.description: Media stop on unload checkbox label.

optionsLocalMediaCategoryName.description: Options page local media category title.

optionsLocalMediaCategoryDescription.message: HTTP сервер запущен мостом для трансляции локальных медиа на устройство.
optionsLocalMediaCategoryDescription.description: Options page local media category description.

optionsReceiverSelectorCategoryName.description: Options page receiver selector category title.

optionsReceiverSelectorCategoryDescripti.description: Options page receiver selector category description.

optionsReceiverSelectorWaitForConnection.description: Receiver selector wait for connection option checkbox label.

optionsReceiverSelectorWaitForConnection.message: Держать меню выбора открытым пока сессия открыта или соединение разорвано.
optionsReceiverSelectorWaitForConnection.description: Receiver selector wait for connection option description.

optionsReceiverSelectorCloseIfFocusLost.description: Receiver selector close if focus lost option checkbox label.

optionsReceiverSelectorExpandActive.message: Маштабировать элементы управления для подключённых устройств
optionsReceiverSelectorExpandActive.description: Receiver selector expand active checkbox label.

optionsReceiverSelectorShowMediaImagesDe.description: Receiver selector show media images option description.

optionsSiteWhitelistCategoryDescription.message: Сайты на которых будет включена функциональность трансляций и заменён user-agent на Chrome для поддержки трансляций.

optionsSiteWhitelistEnabledDescription.message: Отключений данной опции включит функцию трансляций на каждом сайте, но user-agent заменён не будет.

optionsSiteWhitelistAddItem.description: Add new whitelist item button title.

optionsSiteWhitelistEditItem.description: Tooltip text for whitelist item's edit button.

optionsSiteWhitelistRemoveItem.description: Tooltip text for whitelist item's remove button.

optionsSiteWhitelistItemShowOptions.description: Tooltip text for whitelist item's show options button.

optionsSiteWhitelistItemHideOptions.description: Tooltip text for whitelist item's hide options button.

optionsSiteWhitelistInvalidDuplicatePatt.description: Error displayed by input indicating a duplicate match pattern.

optionsSiteWhitelistCustomUserAgentDescr.message: Если указано, будет использоваться для сайтов из белого списка.

optionsSiteWhitelistUserAgentDisabled.description: Whitelist item user agent disabled checkbox label.

optionsSiteWhitelistUserAgentDisabledDes.message: Отключает подмену user-agent для данного шаблона.
optionsSiteWhitelistUserAgentDisabledDes.description: Whitelist item user agent disabled checkbox description.

optionsSiteWhitelistSiteSpecificUserAgen.description: Whitelist item user agent option label.

optionsSiteWhitelistSiteSpecificUserAgen.message: Если указано, собственный user-agent будет использовать специально для сайтов попадающих под данный шаблон.
optionsSiteWhitelistSiteSpecificUserAgen.description: Whitelist item user agent option label.

optionsSiteWhitelistItemPattern.description: Whitelist item pattern edit input title.

optionsMirroringAppIdDescription.message: ID приложения зарегистрирован устройством Chromecast. Только расширенное использование. Может быть совместим с приложением по умолчанию (смотри репозиторий Github)/

optionsMirroringStreamFrameRate.description: Mirroring stream max frame rate option label.

optionsMirroringStreamMaxBitRate.description: Mirroring stream max bit rate option label.

optionsMirroringStreamMaxBitRateDescript.message: Максимальный битрейт в битах в секунду.
optionsMirroringStreamMaxBitRateDescript.description: Mirroring stream max bit rate option description.

optionsMirroringStreamDownscaleFactor.description: Mirroring stream downscale factor option label.

optionsMirroringStreamDownscaleFactorDes.message: Коэффициент, на который можно уменьшить размер видеопотока, например, коэффициент 2.0 приведет к уменьшению размера видео на 1/4.
optionsMirroringStreamDownscaleFactorDes.description: Mirroring stream downscale factor option description.

optionsMirroringStreamMaxResolutionDescr.message: Ограничивает максимальное разрешение видеопотока при сохранении соотношения сторон исходного изображения.

optionsOptionRecommended.description: Badge next to option label indicating boolean option is recommended enabled.

optionsSaved.description: Status text displayed by save button once options have been successfully saved.

mirroringPopupConnectedTo.description: Mirroring popup label displayed whilst session connected before mirroring.

mirroringPopupMirroringTo.description: Mirroring popup label displayed whilst mirroring.

mirroringPopupChooseSource.description: Mirroring popup choose media source button label.

mirroringPopupStopMirroring.description: Mirroring popup stop mirroring button label.
